summary: The code prepares the environment for running RoboGen by setting PYTHONPATH to the current directory, setting CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES to 0 (for GPU usage), and activating the appropriate conda environment (robogen).

details.comment: The code prepares the environment for running RoboGen by setting PYTHONPATH to the current directory, setting CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES to 0 (for GPU usage), and activating the appropriate conda environment (robogen).
details.content:
export PYTHONPATH=${PWD}:$PYTHONPATH
export CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0
conda activate robogen
